title: Emilia Clarke looks sensational in a terracotta coloured trouser suit as she steps out in London
text:
She celebrated her 33rd birthday in Paris on Wednesday.

And Emilia Clarke looked radiant as she stepped out in London on Thursday as she continues to promote her new film Last Christmas.

The Games Of Thrones star, 33, wowed in a terracotta coloured trouser suit with a plunging blazer adorned with two black buttons.

Gorgeous: Emilia Clarke looked radiant as she stepped out in London on Thursday as she continues to promote her new film Last Christmas

Emilia teamed the items of clothing with a black vest top and added height to her petite frame with a pair of beige suede heels.

She added a collection of jewellery to her stylish look which included a pair of gold hooped earrings and a series of rings on her fingers.

Emilia styled her cropped brunette locks into a tousled blow-dried hairdo and added a slick of glamorous make-up.

The star took to Instagram on Wednesday to ring in her 33rd birthday with a fun picture of herself in Paris blowing out a candle, which she credited her new movie Last Christmas for organising.

What a woman! The Games Of Thrones star, 33, wowed in a terracotta coloured trouser suit with a plunging blazer adorned with two black buttons

Wearing a nude coloured dress with her brunette locks sweptback, Emilia captured the photo with: 'You’re right. I’m wishing for more pan aux raisins.

'@lastchristmasthemovie thank you for my Parisian birthday of dreams...London what you sayin? #hotelcostesyoumakesomefancyasscake.'

Earlier in the day, the star showed off her fun side as she shared a hilarious video of herself getting down to 50 Cent's song In Da Club and displaying her moves while pretending to drink champagne.

She started the video hidden by a table, which had 33 pain aux raisins on top, but quickly appeared clutching a bottle of fizz.

Details: Emilia teamed the items of clothing with a black vest top and added height to her petite frame with a pair of beige suede heels

Birthday girl: The star took to Instagram on Wednesday to ring in her 33rd birthday with a fun picture of herself in Paris blowing out a candle, which she credited her new movie Last Christmas for organising

The Game Of Thrones star then held the bottle up as if she was going to take a swig but put it on the table and instead used her hands to dance.

Next Emilia focused on the breakfast snacks, coming in close to them and smiling, before cutting some shapes with her hands and laughing as the video ended.

She shared the video with the caption: 'Says she loves pain aux raisin once. Not all that bothered. @lastchristmasthemovie press tour hooking me UP'

She also included the hashtags: '#birthdaylikeaballer #yesthereare33'

Celebration: Earlier in the day, the star showed off her fun side as she shared a hilarious video of herself getting down to 50 Cent's song In Da Club and displaying her moves while pretending to drink champagne

Getting involved: Emilia moved in close to the pastries which had candles stuck into them as she showed off her moves in the fun clip

Speaking to Stella magazine recently, the brunette beauty said she resonated with her character Kate in her new film Last Christmas, who is a woman also recovering from a life-threatening illness.

'It was uncanny reading the script because it’s my life at this point,' she said.

'I have the benefit of having space between myself and my sickness and what you see through Kate is the fear of what happens when your body fails you in some way.'

In the film, Emilia's character Kate finds work as Santa's elf for a department store and unexpectedly finds love with Tom, played by Henry Golding.

Birthday girl: The actress revealed that she was celebrating while on the press tour for her newest film, Last Christmas

Animated: Emilia appeared in the video from behind a table laid out with breakfast foods

Shapes: The Game Of Thrones star then showed off her moves and used her hands to dance to the music

It comes after the star discussed her own recovery from the life-threatening aneurysm she first suffered in 2011, when she was just 24-years-old.

Appearing on CBS Sunday Morning in April where she recalled the dark place she went to after her surgery, she shared images from her hospital stay, revealing the second aneurysm very nearly killed her.

Discussing the impact it had not just on her physical health but mental well-being, she revealed: 'The first time it was difficult, with the second one I found it much harder to stay optimistic.

Looking good: Emilia looked stylish in a pink shirt and maroon skirt as she danced holding a bottle of champagne to celebrate her birthday

Dancing: Emilia pulled some faces before bursting into laughter and ending the dance party

'[I coped with it as a] a day to day thing. I definitely went through a period of being... down - putting it mildly.'

Emilia explained that when a part of your brain is starved of blood for more than a minute it dies, which is what happened to her after her second aneurysm.

Last Christmas hits cinemas November 7.
description: The Games Of Thrones star, 33, wowed in a terracotta coloured trouser suit with a plunging blazer adorned with two black buttons.
